plot outline: The story begins with a noted singer Shiva (Saurav) who comes on a holiday to a hilly station. Here he meets Megha (Jyothika sri) and in no time, they fall in love. However, things change as Shiva begins to get close to Sneha, twin sister of Megha. But then, it turns out that Sneha is actually a ghost and she was once a staunch admirer of Shiva and his songs but gets murdered by the local guys. While all this is happening, Shiva ends up proposing to Megha and she gives a shocking reaction.
